expectations.expectedButMissing: No mention of international legal mechanisms or multilateral responses to mass abductions in Nigeria, despite scale of the attacks (clusters 57994d78dea93490, dd72d43d09a19363).
No discussion of potential diplomatic consequences of the U.S. withdrawal from COP30 leadership or climate negotiations despite major policy shifts (clusters 70c383479058546a, 369989e54df306a2).

Minimal coverage of the broader implications of the FBI’s involvement in the Melodee Buzzard case beyond the mother’s behavior, despite national attention (clusters 301140828c0ff616, e9821ebaff9f053a).
expectations.theme: Child safety and federal investigative coordination
